com.madrobot.di.xml.converters

Class SerializationMethodInvoker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madrobot.di.xml.converters.SerializationMethodInvoker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.madrobot.di.xml.core.Caching

    public class SerializationMethodInvoker
extends Object
implements com.madrobot.di.xml.core.Caching
    Convenience wrapper to invoke special serialization methods on objects (and perform reflection caching).
    Author:
    Joe Walnes, Jörg Schaible
